title: 100% CPU and freeze on Windows as regression of c6ed855
body:
Alacritty takes 100% CPU and freezes on Windows after c6ed855b.

When line 227 hits for the first time, it returns `Ok(got: 488)`. But in later iterations, it always returns `Ok(got: 0)` and loops forever.
It seems that `Ok(got: 0)` is an edge case on Windows and needs special handling like previous code.

https://github.com/alacritty/alacritty/blob/c6ed855bfa036ffe5e3e3ea12819db6a1a25d4e1/alacritty_terminal/src/event_loop.rs#L225-L265

### System

OS: Windows
Version: c6ed855b

### Logs

